Fourth Period Fog

A hall-pass lo-fi haze: intercom reverb bleeds into school ambience and slow beats while synth shadow textures blur the frame; playful on the surface, but tinged with that between-classes pressure as a mechanical filter fade closes the scene.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: lo-fi, indie, dream pop
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 1:41
